original_text: Do not be yoked together with unbelievers. For what do righteousness and wickedness have in common? Or what fellowship can light have with darkness?
korean_text: 너희는 믿지 않는 자와 멍에를 함께 메지 말라 의와 불법이 어찌 함께 하며 빛과 어둠이 어찌 사귀며

sentences.original_text: Do not be yoked together with unbelievers
sentences.korean_translation: 믿지 않는 자와 함께 멍에를 메지 말라

sentences.original_text: For what do righteousness and wickedness have in common?
Or what fellowship can light have with darkness?
